hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.experience4: Computer Engineering Management and Information Systems

experiences.title: GSSecurity
experiences.description: Development and maintenance of the application used by GSSecurity workers to perform all work tasks. The application, a CRM, facilitates customer relationship management and the company's internal operations. It uses technologies such as PHP, Doctrine, Symfony, JQuery, AJAX, among others.

leavingTheAfterParty.description: Leaving The After Party is a Unity and C# video game created as the final project for a web application development course. Playable online via WebGL, it showcases programming and game design skills. The game features a character navigating obstacles and enemies to escape a party, interacting with others along the way, with the ultimate goal of reaching home safely.

animeFavs.description: Website to list seasonal, popular, and more animes. With the possibility of adding to favorites and viewing details of each anime and its characters.

chatDaw.description: A real-time chat application was developed to enable secure communication between students. The project includes features such as message sending, user list viewing, and real-time updates. The application was built using Java for the business logic, MySQL for database management, and follows an MVC (Model-View-Controller) architecture for proper layer separation.

forestTravel.description: Template for a travel agency, with sections for home, gallery, plans, and contact. Responsive design, animations with Sass and JavaScript, and fully compliant with accessibility guidelines, being Triple-A level.

photoFilterApp.description: Web application to apply different predefined filters to images, with the possibility of uploading an image from the device and downloading the image with the applied filter.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.paragraph1: Hello! My name is Héctor. My passion for programming began when I was a teenager and since then I have been learning and improving my skills. I graduated in Web Application Development and I am currently studying Computer Engineering Management and Information Systems at the Tecnocampus University of Mataró, affiliated with Pompeu Fabra University (UPF).
aboutMe.paragraph2: I currently work as a web developer at a private security company, where my team and I develop and maintain the application, similar to a CRM, that the company's employees use to perform all work tasks. The application facilitates customer relationship management and the company's internal operations.
aboutMe.paragraph3: In my free time, I like to watch series, movies, and play video games, like any young person today. I also like to learn new things and experiment with technologies I don't know.
